attributes.action: Bridgwater By- Pass Call to re-evaluate Data EDF / SCC
attributes.additional_details:
We are calling for a Review of the Decision made, re the NEED for Alternative HIGHWAY Provision, in Respect of the HINKLEY C New Nuclear EDF Power Generators, Bridgwater Somerset.
We believe that SCC / EDF have not put enough weight to the evidence collated in support of this.
By the local communities! SDC. BTC, and the Parish Councils, who all have misgivings....
